EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Chicago
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Chicago.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Tuesday, June 28th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Lunch will be provided Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/chicago]]>
Location 1871 <[[http://www.1871.com/]]> 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza Suite 1212 Chicago, IL 60654 Map & Directions
The workshop location is easily accessible through public transportation. If you are driving to the event, discounted parking <[[http://www.210nwells.com/1871parking]]> is available through 1871.
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
